plugins.name: Ethos
plugins.description:
Ethos offers a top-notch brand asset management software solution and tools to streamline and organize your digital assets effortlessly.

- Create and share your own custom brand showrooms as an interactive website and pdf, and showcase and maintain your branding best practices.

- Share your official brand copy, brand logos, brand colors, brand fonts, brand rules and custom brand sections.

- Deploy your brand voice and image correctly to activate your powerful brand position.

- Improve your existing brand copy to bring it to the next level with artificial intelligence.

- Make your brand more authentic and cohesive by generating expanded primary, secondary and monotone color palettes.

- Invite your team and clients to your official brand spaces, and enable collaboration on one or more brands at a time.


For any questions or feedback, feel free to ping us at team@yourethos.io

accepted.name: Ethos
accepted.description: Build, share, and grow your iconic brand with our complete AI-powered creative brand showroom. Visit https://www.yourethos.io/ for more. Free Figma widget.

plugins.name: Random Rectangle Maker
plugins.description:
This plugin was made for testing purposes to test the cursor AI. I used Cursor AI to write the code and ChatGPT to help design the cover and icon. It’s a quick example of how fun and fast building with AI tools can be.


With one click, the plugin adds a rectangle to your canvas. Each rectangle shows up in a random spot with a random bright color.


→ Made with the help of Cursor AI for coding

→ Visuals created with ChatGPT

→ Quick, simple, and fun to use

→ A small tool for creative ideas


I really enjoy working where design and code come together. If you’re building something creative like a design tool, plugin, or even a storytelling project, I’d love to connect.


Reach out anytime: hey@abdulwahab.design

Or connect on LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/heyabdulwahab/

accepted.name: Abdul Wahab
accepted.description:
Senior Visual Design Analyst at Accenture Song
— — — 
I blend creativity and technical background to design beautiful efficient interfaces and experiences ◡̈

plugins.tagline: Random rectangles with colorful precision.

plugins.name: ComponentFiller AI
plugins.description:
ComponentFiller は生成AIを用いて、選択したフレームの原稿と、人間が用意したコンポーネントのコードを組み合わせ、コンポーネントに適切な原稿を入力したコードを返します（要APIキー／Gemini のAPIは無料で取得できます）


利用方法

  1. 利用するAIのAPIを選択
  2. APIキーを入力
  3. 利用する言語と、言語に合わせた基本のプロンプトを設定（任意）
  4. ベースとなるコンポーネントのコードを入力
  5. 利用したいフレームを選択
  6. コードを生成


注意事項：コードを生成するために、選択したAIサービスにデータが送信されます


---


ComponentFiller uses generation AI to combine the script for the selected frame with the component code prepared by humans, and returns a code with the appropriate script entered into the component (API key required).


How to use

  1. Select the AI ​​API to use
  2. Enter the API key
  3. Set the language to use and the basic prompt for the language (optional)
  4. Enter the base component code
  5. Select the frame you want to use
  6. Generate code


Please note: Your data will be sent to the AI ​​service of your choice to generate the code.
plugins.tagline: Insert the text from the design data into your code

plugins.name: QQT Random Number Generator
plugins.description:
This is a Figma plugin that replaces selected text with randomly generated numbers. It supports both Chinese and English language interfaces, has a clear visual hierarchy, and is simple and intuitive to operate.

Functional Features

1. Range Setting: You can set the minimum and maximum values of the random numbers (e.g., 20 - 50).

2. Decimal Place Setting: You can set the number of digits after the decimal point.

3. Thousand Separator Display: You can choose whether to insert a thousand separator in the number.

4. Custom Prefix and Suffix: You can add custom prefixes and suffixes, such as +, -, %, HKD, ¥, etc.

5. Chinese - English Switch: It supports quick switching between Chinese and English interfaces.


这是一个Figma插件，用于将选中的文本替换为随机生成的数字。支持中英文双语界面，视觉层次分明，操作简单直观。

功能特点

1. 区间设定：可以设置随机数字的最小值和最大值（例如20～50）

2. 小数位设置：可以设置小数点后的位数

3. 千分位显示：可以选择是否在数字中插入千分位分隔符

4. 自定义前后缀：可以添加自定义前缀和后缀，如+、-、%、HKD、¥等

5. 中英文切换：支持中英文界面快速切换
plugins.tagline: This is a Figma plugin that replaces selected text with randomly generated numbers.

plugins.name: Long side scaling
plugins.description:
Tired of manually resizing images within frames one by one, especially when you need them to fit a specific maximum dimension while keeping their aspect ratio? "Long Side Scaling" automates this task!


What this plugin does:

  1. It finds the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill inside each selected Frame.
  2. It takes the dimension you provide (e.g., 1040px).
  3. It identifies whether the image's width or height is larger (the "longest side").
  4. It then proportionally resizes the image so that its longest side exactly matches the dimension you entered.


How to use:

  1. Select one or more Frames containing the images you want to resize.
  2. Run the "Long Side Scaling" plugin from the Plugins menu.
  3. The plugin window will show how many selected frames contain a suitable image.
  4. Enter the desired dimension (in pixels) for the longest side into the input field.
  5. Click the "Start" button.
  6. The images within the selected frames will be resized instantly!


Key Benefits:

  1. Batch Processing: Saves time by resizing images in multiple frames at once.
  2. Proportional Scaling: Guarantees your images won't be stretched or distorted.
  3. Consistent Sizing: Perfect for creating uniform image galleries, grids, or ensuring images don't exceed a maximum width or height.
  4. Simple Interface: Easy to use with just one input and one button.


Important Note:

This plugin specifically targets the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill it finds directly within each selected Frame. Images inside groups within the frame, or images applied as fills to shapes other than Rectangles, will not be affected.
plugins.tagline: Scale images proportionally by their longest side.

130386.tagline: Scale images proportionally by their longest side.

plugins.name: FigJam Sticky Color Picker
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for setting the color of Sticky:

  1. Directly set the fill color of the Sticky.
  2. It is also able to set the color of the text within the Sticky.
  3. You can set the color for a single Sticky node, or for multiple selected Sticky nodes. Even more, you can directly select an area, and the plugin will automatically identify the Sticky nodes within the selected area and change their colors as well as the colors of the text.
plugins.tagline: Custom the color of sticky and sticky text

plugins.name: LARA for Figma
plugins.description:
LARA is the flagship product of Lithero, the first AI company to design and build products specifically for pharma marketing teams. LARA is a custom-made AI that learns the nuances of pharma brands at lightspeed, supporting brand teams throughout the end-to-end content creation process.


The official LARA for Figma plugin brings the power of LARA Screen and LARA Claims to your workspace. Get actionable feedback on the compliance of your content at the point of creation, saving significant time downstream. LARA for Figma complements the content creation process by ensuring high quality and accuracy of created content. Shorten review cycles, reduce spend, and get the most out of Figma with LARA!


Key Features:

Claims

- Detect differences between created content and approved claims, enabling corrections before MLR

- Trace claims back to their references and associated safety text in LARA Claims for additional context


Safety Text

- Identify and insert any required safety text missing from the content

- Generate accurate & complete safety text blocks to insert into content


References

- Find potential approved references that could be used to substantiate claims

- Locate any claims that are missing citations to typically seen references


*Requires subscription to LARA Claims and Screen. For more information, visit https://www.lithero.com/
plugins.tagline: Bring the power of LARA to your process

plugins.name: XenVision
plugins.description:
Simplify your design review workflow by seamlessly exporting Figma designs to Xenvision. This plugin bridges the gap between Figma and Xenvision, enabling quick exports without leaving your workspace.


Key features:

• One-click export to Xenvision

• Maintain design fidelity during transfer

• Streamline your design review process

• Save time on manual exports and uploads


Perfect for teams using Xenvision as their design review platform. Export individual frames or entire pages directly from Figma to kickstart your design feedback process.
plugins.tagline: Export designs directly to Xenvision for streamlined design reviews

plugins.name: 图像矢量化 Image Tracer
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to convert raster images into scalable vector graphics with a single click. Enhance your design process by transforming pixel-based images into smooth, resolution-independent vectors directly within Figma.


Function Description

  1. Vectorizes selected image nodes into SVG format.
  2. Preserves image structure and generates editable vector paths.
  3. Outputs scalable vector graphics compatible with Figma’s design tools.


How to Use

  1. Select an image node on your Figma canvas.
  2. Click the “Vectorize Image” button in the plugin UI.
  3. The plugin will generate an SVG vector output placed adjacent to the original image node.


Notes

  1. Ensure only one image node is selected before using the plugin.
  2. Only image nodes are supported for vectorization. Non-image nodes will not be processed.
  3. Large images may take additional time for processing.


介绍

此 Figma 插件支持一键将光栅图像转换为可缩放的矢量图形，让您在 Figma 内直接将像素图转换为平滑的、分辨率无关的矢量图，从而提升设计流程。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的图像节点矢量化为 SVG 格式。
  2. 保留图像结构，生成可编辑的矢量路径。
  3. 输出的矢量图与 Figma 的设计工具兼容。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 画布上选择一个图像节点。
  2. 点击插件界面的“矢量化图像”按钮。
  3. 插件将在原始图像节点旁生成一个 SVG 矢量输出。


注意事项

  1. 请确保使用插件前只选中了一个图像节点。
  2. 仅支持对图像节点进行矢量化，非图像节点将无法处理。
  3. 对于较大的图像，处理时间可能会稍长。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Convert Images to Vectors Seamlessly

plugins.name: Screen Count
plugins.description:
Screen Count updates the numbers on your screen labels based on position (top to bottom, left to right). Just add the name of the label container, select the flow or frame you want to update, and hit "Renumber".


You can now use letters instead of numbers or choose to append to the existing text rather than replace it.
plugins.tagline: Updated screen numbering for flows in a couple clicks

plugins.name: Clean frame numbers
plugins.description:
Do you have Frame 239659303 names around your figma file? Then this plugin is made to clean it up.


This is NOT to rename the numbers, it's to clean up the numbers.

plugins.name: FigWP - Figma to WordPress Converter
plugins.description:
Figma to WordPress plugin effortlessly converts Figma designs into Elementor & Essential Addons for Elementor widgets for WordPress, maintaining the integrity of styling, dimensions, and content. It bridges the gap between design and development, allowing teams to work more efficiently.


Key Highlights:


  1. 15+ Elementor Widgets – Compatible with all essential Elementor widgets.
  2. Instant Conversion – Real-time processing with visual updates.
  3. Style Consistency – Retains colors, fonts, spacing, and overall design integrity.


How It Works:


  1. API Integration – Set up your Figma API key for seamless connectivity.
  2. Naming Standards – Adhere to specific naming conventions for best performance.
  3. Select Layers – Pick the frames or components you want to convert.
  4. Automated Conversion – Let the tool process your selection, with live progress updates.
  5. Export Options – Copy the JSON code or download it directly for WordPress integration.


Usage Guidelines:


Follow these essential steps to ensure everything works smoothly:


Use a valid and active Figma API key.

Confirm you have edit access to the file.

Use ‘Auto Layout’ wherever possible to avoid design breakage.

Use ‘Containers’ if column layout breaks (optional but helpful).

All Sections & Inner Sections must contain ‘Columns’.

Frames or layers must be named using our supported Elementor widget names:


  1. Container
  2. Button
  3. Heading
  4. Text Editor
  5. Creative Button
  6. Dual Color Heading
  7. Advanced Menu
  8. Advanced Menu → Menu → Menu Active
  9. Call to Action
  10. Info Box
  11. Post Carousel
  12. Testimonial
  13. Feature List
  14. Counter → Number
  15. Logo Carousel
  16. Woo Product List
  17. Content
  18. Image
  19. Subheading
  20. Rating

accepted.name: Startise
accepted.description: With 6+ million users, Startise is the dynamic parent company of top 5 brands in industry (WPDeveloper, Storeware, xCloud & more) to help you get success.

plugins.tagline: Convert Figma designs to Elementor instantly—pixel-perfect, responsive, and effortless.

plugins.name: Corner Radius Balancer
plugins.description:
Corner Radius Balancer

Tired of manually calculating corner radius for nested elements in Auto Layout? 😩

This plugin helps you automatically balance the corner radius relationship between a parent frame and its child element, based on the simple formula: Parent Radius = Child Radius + Padding.


How it Works

The plugin simplifies your workflow by linking the three key values. When you adjust one, the others intelligently update:

Adjust Parent Radius

Padding remains fixed, and Child Radius updates automatically.

Adjust Padding

Parent Radius remains fixed, and Child Radius updates automatically.

Adjust Child Radius

Padding remains fixed, and Parent Radius updates automatically.


Key Features

Quick Fix Button ⚡

Instantly corrects the corner radius relationship with a single click.

Real-time Preview

See your changes on the canvas as you make them in the plugin.

Sync with Figma UI

Changes made directly in Figma's properties panel are reflected in the plugin.

Supports Various Corner Patterns

Works with uniform, partial, and custom corner radii by preserving the differences between them.


How to Use 📝

Select a Parent Frame

Choose a parent frame that uses Auto Layout and contains a child rectangle.

Adjust Values

Use the sliders or input fields in the plugin to adjust the values.

Complete

Click "Done" when finished.
plugins.tagline: Automatically adjust nested corner radius values.

plugins.name: Chartify
plugins.description:
Chartify is a powerful yet simple plugin that helps you turn spreadsheet data into clean, customizable charts — directly in Figma.


Just upload a file or paste a public Google Sheets link, and Chartify will generate a beautiful chart that fits right into your design.


What Chartify can do:

  1. Supports data from:
  2. CSV, TSV, Excel (.xlsx/.xls)
  3. Google Sheets (public links)
  4. HTML tables, XML, Word (.docx), PDF, and more
  5. 6 chart types:
  6. Line
  7. Smooth Line
  8. Column
  9. Bar
  10. Pie
  11. Donut
  12. Smart customization options:
  13. Auto layout support
  14. Figma Variables for styles
  15. Optional axes, grid, and legends
  16. Responsive and consistent with your design system



How to use:

  1. Open the plugin.
  2. Upload a data file or paste a public Google Sheets URL.
  3. (Optional) Enter the sheet name.
  4. Choose the chart type.
  5. Adjust settings: auto layout, variables, axes, and legend.
  6. Click Generate — your chart will appear directly on the canvas.


Chartify is built for designers who need to visualize data fast — without leaving Figma.

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Effortless Data Charts in Figma

plugins.name: Token Exporter Pro
plugins.description:
Export Figma color, gradient, and shadow tokens with one click — no fluff, just clean, dev-ready output.


Choose your naming convention (camelCase, PascalCase, dot.notation…), match your framework (React, Tailwind, or plain CSS), and get tokens you can actually use.


Includes:

✅ Linear & radial gradients (with angles)

✅ Shadow exports (drop & inner)

✅ Format-ready for Tailwind, JSON, and SCSS

✅ Works great with Style Dictionary or custom configs


Perfect for design system handoffs, developer styling, and anyone who’s tired of manually formatting hex codes.
plugins.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma — with naming styles, framework formats, gradients & shadows.

plugins.name: Design2Dev
plugins.description:
Design2Dev is a Figma plugin that extracts detailed design specs and generates structured AI prompts for React Native. Map custom UIs to design systems, export specs as JSON, and get production-ready code from ChatGPT, Claude, or Cursor — no guesswork, just clarity.


Description:

Design2Dev bridges the gap between your polished Figma designs and AI-generated React Native code. No more guess-and-check with plain-language prompts—this plugin produces developer-grade output in seconds:


  1. Extract design specs – Build a full JSON mapping of component hierarchy, styles (colours, typography, spacing), layout properties, and design tokens.
  2. Map to UI libraries – Auto-align designs with React Native Paper or other design systems.
  3. Generate AI prompts – Output prompt-ready TXT files formatted to work effortlessly with ChatGPT, Claude, Cursor, Gemini, etc.
  4. Export visuals and specs – Export PNG snapshots of selected frames, and JSON + TXT bundles—ready for automated workflows or human inspection.
  5. Designed for speed – Perfect for solo designers/devs needing accurate code now, not later. No least-common-denominator outputs—just intention-preserving handoffs.


Ideal For:

  1. Designers shipping React Native apps today
  2. Developers optimizing prompt engineering from visuals
  3. Teams wanting clean spec-to-code pipelines before Figma or Bolt catch up
plugins.tagline: Turn Figma Designs into AI-Ready Code Prompts. Instantly.

139506.description:

Design2Dev bridges the gap between your polished Figma designs and AI-generated React Native code. No more guess-and-check with plain-language prompts—this plugin produces developer-grade output in seconds:


  1. Extract design specs – Build a full JSON mapping of component hierarchy, styles (colours, typography, spacing), layout properties, and design tokens.
  2. Map to UI libraries – Auto-align designs with React Native Paper or other design systems.
  3. Generate AI prompts – Output prompt-ready TXT files formatted to work effortlessly with ChatGPT, Claude, Cursor, Gemini, etc.
  4. Export visuals and specs – Export PNG snapshots of selected frames, and JSON + TXT bundles—ready for automated workflows or human inspection.
  5. Designed for speed – Perfect for solo designers/devs needing accurate code now, not later. No least-common-denominator outputs—just intention-preserving handoffs.


Ideal For:

  3. Teams wanting clean spec-to-code pipelines before Figma or Bolt catch up

139506.tagline: Turn Figma Designs into AI-Ready Code Prompts. Instantly.

plugins.name: Thumbly
plugins.description:
Thumbly — Instant Project Thumbnails

Create beautiful project thumbnails — fast and professional. This plugin helps you generate stunning thumbnail covers for your projects, presentations, and portfolio content directly in Figma.


No need to design covers from scratch. Just enter your title, description, pick an emoji, choose a theme — and Thumbly generates a ready-to-use thumbnail frame in seconds.


Key features:

  1. Instant thumbnail generation with custom text
  2. 100+ project-themed emojis to choose from
  3. Light and dark theme presets
  4. Optimized 1920×960px cover size
  5. Built-in Auto Layout for precise structure

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.tagline: Effortless thumbnail design for every project.

plugins.name: Rename by text list
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you rename multiple layers in bulk using a text-based list.

Simply select two Auto Layout frames:

  1. One containing the elements to rename (any layer type)
  2. One containing text nodes with the desired names

The plugin will rename each element in the first frame using the corresponding text content from the second frame, based on their order in the layers panel.
plugins.tagline: Rename one list of items by another list of text items

plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

136537.name: Layer Query
136537.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
136537.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

plugins.name: PagePorter
plugins.description: PagePort is a powerful Figma plugin that helps you easily export and import page names in multiple formats like CSV, JSON, XML, and more. Whether you’re documenting layouts, syncing with development tools, or organizing files, PagePort streamlines your workflow with just a few clicks. It supports drag-and-drop file import, real-time feedback.
plugins.tagline: Import and export Figma pages with ease — clean, fast, and multi-format ready.

plugins.name: Textos para Cards
plugins.description:
Textos para Cards é um plugin que aplica automaticamente seus blocos de texto nos cards correspondentes no Figma, usando nomes como texto 1 -, texto 2 -, etc.

Ideal para carrosséis, infográficos e conteúdos de redes sociais.

Basta colar o texto e deixar o plugin fazer o trabalho repetitivo por você.
plugins.tagline: Transforme texto em design, em segundos.
